text: Fusinus stegeri is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Lyons, W.G. (1978), Fusinus stegeri (Gastropoda: Fasciolaridae), a new species from the eastern Gulf of Mexico; Nautilus 92(2): 85-88 stegeri Category:Gastropods described in 1978
title: Fusinus stegeri
